about_the_game:
Transformation!

Incognito isn't just any Squirrol… This companion can sneak in anywhere!
This fearless red-haired critter loves changing clothes: glasses, caps, fake moustaches…
Prepare to be surprised at the stunning disguises!

More than just a fashionista – Incognito's also an incredible field agent!
Choose from among various skills:
CONFUSION: Does damage to all enemies.
DISGUISE: Boosts a random Attack card in hand.
WHITISH FANG: Does piercing damage to the first enemy.

Take care of Incognito to make your relationship grow!
The more you play with this companion, the stronger its skills will get as you progress in the game.
But like any creature, this Squirrol needs a special diet.
If you want it to level up, you'll have to find as many divine statues as you can.
You may end up taking risks, but hey, you'd do anything for your little furball!
